title: Bug 2324[UI] Error in DialogPageContextComputer comment (1GER27D)
description: Bug 2324[UI] Error in DialogPageContextComputer comment (1GER27D) Isn't it also used for dialogs?NOTES:RG (6/3/01 10:52:42 AM)Should be For determining the help context for controls in a dialog page.
OB: From GregDialogPageContextComputer For determining the help context for controls in a wizard page.Comment implies wizard pages.
